::DrillBit::

DrillBit arrives at the base.
"DrillBit, terrorize." He transformed, and put Land Mine in a CR pool.
He put the terminated body nexed to it, hoping someone would find it.
He then ran out of the base, and opened a comm.
"KitKat. Time Bomb is dead. Land Mine is in a CR. Where are you?" He
askes.
